message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.DC, cs.AR 

Reasoning: 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) is the most likely category as the paper focuses on Cloud Radio Access Network (CRAN) and virtualized small cells, which are related to wireless networking and communication. 
- cs.IT (Information Theory) is also likely as the paper discusses QoS requirements and energy budget, which are related to information theory and communication systems. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control) is another possible category as the paper applies Dynamic Programming (DP) to determine the optimal functional split option, which is related to control systems. 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) is also possible as the paper discusses the distribution of baseband processing between local and remote processing in the cloud. 
- cs.AR (Hardware Architecture) is less likely but still possible as the paper discusses the power consumption breakdown of base stations and the decision on where to place each baseband function in the system, which are related to hardware architecture.
